GAMEPLAY_MakeshiftBlanketDescription.English: An improvised blanket sewn together from scraps of cloth. Will keep you a little warmer on those cold, winter nights.
GAMEPLAY_MakeshiftBlanketDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una manta improvisada, cosida con pedazos de tela. Te mantendrá algo más caliente en esas frías noches de invierno.

GAMEPLAY_MakeshiftBedrollDescription.English: An improvised bedroll sewn together from scraps of cloth. Should keep you warm enough.
GAMEPLAY_MakeshiftBedrollDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un saco de dormir improvisado, cosido con pedazos de tela. Debería mantenerte caliente, más o menos.

GAMEPLAY_OldBlanketDescription.English: An old and dusty wool blanket. Abandoned, but still soft to the touch. Will keep you warmer on those cold, winter nights.
GAMEPLAY_OldBlanketDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una vieja y polvorienta manta de lana. Abandonada, pero aún es suave al tacto. Te mantendrá más caliente en esas frías noches de invierno.
